verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Bb
Hungry I come to You
For I know You satisfy
I am empty
But I know Your love
Does not run dry
And so I wait for You
So I wait for You

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I'm falling on my knees
Offering all of me
Jesus You're all
This heart is living for

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Broken I run to You
For Your arms are open wide
I am weary
But I know Your touch
Restores my life
And so I wait for You
So I wait for You
